Name: Crysis 2: Limited Edition
Overview:
Whether played in 3D or standard 2D, Crysis 2 drops players into a devastated New York in the midst of an attack by a frightening alien species. The alien enemies are armed with deadly weaponry and exceptional sensory abilities that test playersâ€™ skill and push them to the limit. These terrifying invaders stalk the streets of New York, leaving the streets in chaos and the skyline in flaming ruin.

Surrounded by catastrophic destruction, players harness the superhuman abilities of the Nanosuit to level the playing field, becoming the ultimate weapon on a mission to save New York.

The Limited Edition includes features four must-have in-game unlocks for the ultimate multiplayer experience: Bonus XP, a SCAR hologram decoy, a SCAR weapon skin and a platinum dog tag.
